dynamic_line: Given the context of your assignment, we are willing to sell you a set of our protective gear - a gas mask and an environmental suit - at a considerable discount.  We will part with it for two exchange coins."  The intercom waits expectantly.  "Actually, hold on, we might not have one in your size…

responses.text: What will it do for me?
I have to give it a thought.

dynamic_line:
What the gas mask does should be obvious; we'll provide you with a cartridge, of course.  The environment suit is full-body, and protects you from water, harmful radiation, and environmental hazards.  It's also rated to protect from electric shocks of up to twelve thousand volts."

"Bear in mind that the suit isn't armor.  It will keep you safe from the environment, but it's just Nomex and it won't protect you from anything stronger than a punch.  The modular defense system is designed to fit over it, so I'd urge you to bring them both if fighting is unavoidable.
To assist your operations, we are willing to sell you a map of the local area, as surveyed by our cam-spy drones.  Its standing price is 1 HGC.

responses.text: I'll have to give it some thought.

dynamic_line: Excellent, please deposit the printouts in the intercom's tray.  We'll issue a reward based on the quality of your recordings.
Excellent, this should be enough to work with.  Here's the agreed reward.
Great, this looks like a very high quality recording.  Here's the agreed payment, and a small bonus.

Uh… please allow me a second to check this in."

"Well it looks like this is a real treasure trove of information.  In fact you have made quite an impression on R&D, and probably just saved us a few weeks of research at the least.  Also, they demanded you were given triple the agreed payment, so well, there you go.
